DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AEROSPACE
DOC.TEXT: Made-in-Japan Rocket Blasts Off : The first major rocket developed completely in Japan roared into space from a launch_pad in Tanegashima.The country hopes the advanced H-II will lift Japan into the commercial satellite business . However , analysts say the cost of the H-II ' s leading-edge technology -- coupled with the strong yen -- will make_it too expensive to compete in the tough satellite-launching market . The H-II was developed at a cost of $ 2.4 billion .
